No. E-7440) Sub Withdrawal of funds from CBS Accounts of NHAI Release of Bulk payments Revision in limit of Bulk Payments reg: Reference Policy Circular No.11041/217/2007-Admn (renamed as Policy No.3.5.4) , dt.08.07.2009 (copy enclosed) read with Office Order No. NHAI/FGA/CBS/2007-08/1l-8, dt.17.03.2010 (copy enclosed), wherein all PIUs were asked to seek confirmation through Fax/e-mail before release of any bulk payment; i.e. more than Rs. 5.00 Crores in a vide para-2(I) of the said policy circular. 2 Reference is also   invited to (i) Office Order No_ NHAI/FGA/CBS/2016- 17/32, dt.15.06.2016 (copy enclosed) (ii) Office Memorandum No. NHAI/Fin/CBS/LA/2016-17/111 , dt.30.09.2016 (copy enclosed) and (iii) Office Memorandum No. NHAI/F&A/ CBS/2018-19/56, dt.31.01.2019 . 3. Competent Authority has decided now to revise the said limit of bulk payment, i.e Rs. 5.OOCrores in a to Rs. 10.00 Crores (Rupees Ten Crores) per transaction per with immediate effect. Accordingly, all FAUs located at Regional Offices are authorized to draw funds for payments up to Rs.10 Crores per transaction per without   seeking any confirmation from HQ 4_ In excess of the aforesaid limit f Rs.10 crore per transaction per Head-FAUs shall have to seek confirmation from HQ through a fund requisition only in the prescribed format (enclosed) by e-mail to the concerned GM (F&A) at least two clear working days in advance for the processing of requisition and managing the available funds in CBS accounts. 5_ Other terms referred in the above cited Policy Circular No.3.5.4 and also in Office Memoranda cited above, remain unchanged. 6_ This issues with approval of the Competent Authority. 24[v (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord) Encl: As above All Officers of NHAI HQV ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1.
